QuestData.Title: Relics of the Four Kings
QuestData.Description: The mogu have reawakened and are a threat to all of Pandaria. They are on the cusp of becoming even more dangerous.$B$BThere are four great mogu kings of legend: Zian of the Endless Shadow, Meng the Demented, Qiang the Merciless, and Subetai the Swift. Four artifacts of these kings are secreted away in the Vault of Kings Past, below.$B$BYou must retrieve these relics before the mogu discover them and become unstoppable.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Lantern of the Sorcerer King, Mad King Meng's Balance, Qiang's "The Science of War", and Subetai's Bow of the Swift.
